description:
Trystan Bull, Rod Daily and Jesse Cox are on the set having photos snapped at every direction. These three will be nice and warmed up for the actual scene once these shots are finished.

First they have photos taken of the positions they will be fucking in or sucking cock. They try lots of positions but only a few will make it into the actual scene that you will see soon in the next Trystan Bull update. Stay tuned cause once the photos are finished that means hot sexy action and awesome cum shots.

Enjoy!
title: On The Set - Trystan Bull, Rod Daily & Jesse Cox
